doc.title: msGetPropertyEnabled

value.content:
Non-standard: This feature is non-standard and is not on a standards track. Do not use it on production sites facing the Web: it will not work for every user. There may also be large incompatibilities between implementations and the behavior may change in the future.

The msGetPropertyEnabled returns whether a given property in the style object is enabled.

This proprietary method is specific to Internet Explorer browser.

value.title: Syntax
value.content: var retVal = style.msGetPropertyEnabled(name);

value.title: Parameters
value.content:
name [in]

Type: String

The name of the property to enable.

value.title: Return value
value.content:
Type: Boolean

If false, the property is not enabled. If true, the property is enabled.

doc.summary: The msGetPropertyEnabled returns whether a given property in the style object is enabled.
